site_info:
Once someone told me...
"Make something for me!
Don't just buy a thing...
I want it to be unique,
made by you!"

I thought of it, I sketched it, I prepared it,
I broke it, I made it again, I changed it
and in the end I made it!

This is how Sellinofos got started!

With passion and willingness to create!
Because creation is the best way to enjoy life!
parallax_quote:
"Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake"
Henry David Thoreau
